comment: The neighbors of a vertex ` X ` form a subset of all vertices except the vertex ` X ` itself. Stronger version of ~ nbgrssvtx . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 13-Jul-2018.) (Revised by AV, 3-Nov-2020.) (Revised by AV, 12-Feb-2022.)
